```{r}

library(readr)
library(skimr)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
library(forcats)


```



```{r}

superstore <- read_csv('inst/app/data/SampleSuperstore.csv') %>% 
  clean_names()


```


```{r}

skim(superstore)


```



```{r}

head(superstore)

```



### Ship Mode

```{r}

count_ship_mode <- superstore %>% 
  select(ship_mode) %>% 
  group_by(ship_mode) %>%
  mutate(count = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  distinct()

count_ship_mode

count_ship_mode %>% 
  mutate(ship_mode = fct_reorder(ship_mode, desc(count))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(ship_mode, count)) +
  geom_col()
  

```

### state

```{r, fig.height=10}

count_state <- superstore %>% 
  select(state) %>% 
  group_by(state) %>%
  mutate(count = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  distinct()

count_state

count_state %>% 
  mutate(state = fct_reorder(state, count)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(state, count)) +
  geom_col() +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)
  ) +
  coord_flip()


```
